settings.title: Raise Capital for Any Company Webinar
settings.description: It's gonna be epic. Will you be joining us?

1606169938567.name: Text: what you'll learn + About Bob

settings.text:
What You Will Learn...

  • How to raise millions for any company at the best valuation possible given your stage of development
  • Learn how to plan your financing strategy and runway to limit risk and maximize your valuation. Which minimizes dilution of the founders and could mean the difference between owning 20% or 50% of your company when you no longer need capital.

  • Be able to identify the right investors to approach 

  • Understand the level of team you need to be successful in raising outside funding. Objectively, as most founding teams lack required skills.

  • Understand where your company needs to be in terms of the plan, product development, and other factors to drive up your chances of success 

  • Be able to develop a strong financing strategy for the next two to five years that will impress investors

  • Be able to create a pitch deck and market entry strategy that will hook investors and show them you have done your homework and understand your market  

  • Learn how to build value that will convince investors that you’re worthy of their capital, trust, and time

    This webinar tackles the foundational principles of raising funding from any source -- that at least 80% of pitches I have seen lack. Which is why only 10% to 20% will get initial interest after a pitch and few than 5% will ever raise a large amount of capital.

    Listening to this free webinar is the closest you can get to increasing your chance of success in capital raising. And after the presentation we will have a Q & A session to address your questions.

About Bob Norton

Serial Entrepreneur, CEO,CEO Coach and Adviser

  • Serial Entrepreneur & CEO since
    1989. Founded six companies.
  • Four exits totaling over $1 billion in
    profits to investors
  • Grew two startups to $100M and
    $156M in sales in 5 years and 3 years
  • Author of four books
  • Over 125 published articles and
    produced 300+ training videos
  • Creator of The CEO & Entrepreneur
    Boot Camp
  • Creator of AirTight Management,
    world's first modular Management
    Operating System
  • Angel Investor, Philanthropist,
    Licensed Pilot, Yacht Racing Captain,
    Advanced SCUBA Diver

Categories of Capital You Can Tap into Depending on Your Stage, Team and Plans

There are over thirty (yes, 30) categories of sources for funds for your business. 

Venture Capitalists and angel investors get most of the press, but they are a small fraction of business funding. And almost any company should be tapping multiple channels of capital. With a three-to-five-year financing strategy and plan. As growth and scaling requires more capital. 

1. Angel investors - $50K to $3 million per round up to $3M with syndicates

2. Venture Capital - $2 million to $50 million in stages

3. Many forms of debt - Bank debt, lines of credit, private debt, hard money, private notes

4.Crowdfunding - Reg A and others. Now up to $10 millions

5. Royalty Financing

6. SPACs, Reverse mergers, public shells

7. Private Placements, Reg D

And 23 other sources of capital . . .

Everything we will teach will help you not just improve your chances of raising capital but will increase your valuation too. And will help with any of these sources.  Meaning more equity for you and your team.

What are you waiting for?

Register Now. Seats Are Limited.
